title: PBS FRONTLINE From Jesus To Christ The First Christians 2of4 Div
description:
PBS FRONTLINE: From Jesus To Christ - The First Christians, part 2 of 4


Information: 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Explore the life of Jesus and the movement he started, by challenging familiar assumptions and conventional notions about Christianity&#039;s origins. FRONTLINE draws upon controversial new historical evidence and interviews with New Testament scholars to trace Jesus&#039; life. The film focuses on events after his death and on his first followers, men and women whose beliefs, conviction, and martyrdom transformed the Roman Empire in just 300 years.
